amendment.description: Amendment allows all consumers to obtain a free annual credit report from any nationwide consumer reporting agency.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to require that regional credit bureaus also be required to give consumers a free copy of their credit report each year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank (MA) amendment (A010) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 186, 1 Present (Roll no. 497).
